name: src/api/RealtimeAPI.js
RealtimeMode
description: Enum for Realtime modes.

unknown.tagValue: {RealtimeMode}

name: RealtimeAPI
description: This class provides convenience methods to access to the [geOps realtime api](https://developer.geops.io/apis/realtime/).
examples:
import { RealtimeAPI } from 'mobility-toolbox-js/api';

const api = new RealtimeAPI("yourUrl");

name: constructor
description: Constructor

params.name: options
params.description: A string representing the url of the service or an object containing the url and the apiKey.

params.name: options.projection
params.description: The epsg code of the projection for features. Default to EPSG:3857.

params.defaultValue: [minX, minY, maxX, maxY, zoom, tenant] The bounding box to receive data from.
params.defaultRaw: [minX, minY, maxX, maxY, zoom, tenant] The bounding box to receive data from.
params.name: options.bbox

name: close
description: Close the websocket connection without reconnection.

name: reset
description: Unsubscribe trajectory and deleted_vehicles channels. To resubscribe you have to set a new BBOX.

name: onOpen
description:
Callback when the websocket is opened and ready.
It applies the bbox and the projection.

name: onClose
description:
Callback when the websocket is closed by the server.
It auto reconnects after a timeout.

name: subscribe
description: Subscribe to a channel.

params.name: channel
params.description: Name of the websocket channel to subscribe.

params.name: quiet
params.description: If true avoid to store the subscription in the subscriptions list.

name: unsubscribe
description: Unsubscribe both modes of a channel.

params.name: channel
params.description: Name of the websocket channel to unsubscribe.

params.name: suffix
params.description: Suffix to add to the channel name.

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: filterDepartures
description: Filter departures and return an array.

params.name: depObject
params.description: The object containing departures by id.

params.name: sortByMinArrivalTime
params.description: If true sort departures by arrival time.

name: subscribeDepartures
description: Subscribe to departures channel of a given station.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Function called on each message of the channel.

name: unsubscribeDepartures
description: Unsubscribe from current departures channel.

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: subscribeDisruptions
description: Subscribe to the disruptions channel for tenant.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Function called on each message of the channel.

name: unsubscribeDisruptions
description: Unsubscribe disruptions.

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: getStation
description: Return a station with a given uic number and a mode.

name: getStations
description: Update the model's station list for a given mode and a bbox.

name: subscribeStations
description:
Subscribe to stations channel.
One message pro station.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Function called on each message of the channel.

name: unsubscribeStations
description: Unsubscribe to stations channel.

params.name: cb
params.description: The listener callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribe.

name: subscribeExtraGeoms
description: Subscribe to extra_geoms channel.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Function called on each message of the channel.

name: unsubscribeExtraGeoms
description: Unsubscribe to extra_geoms channel.

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: subscribeTrajectory
description: Subscribe to trajectory channel.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Function called on each message of the channel.

params.name: quiet
params.description: If true, the subscription will not send GET and SUB requests to the websocket.

name: unsubscribeTrajectory
description: Unsubscribe to trajectory channels.

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: subscribeDeletedVehicles
description: Subscribe to deleted_vhicles channel.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Function called on each message of the channel.

params.name: quiet
params.description: If true, the subscription will not send GET and SUB requests to the websocket.

name: unsubscribeDeletedVehicles
description: Unsubscribe to deleted_vhicles channels.

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: getFullTrajectory
description: Get a full trajectory of a vehicule .

params.name: generalizationLevel
params.description: The generalization level to request. Can be one of 5 (more generalized), 10, 30, 100, undefined (less generalized).

name: getFullTrajectories
description: Get full trajectories of a vehicules .

params.name: generalizationLevel
params.description: The generalization level to request. Can be one of '', 'gen5', 'gen10', 'gen30', 'gen100'.

return.description: Return an array of full trajectories.

name: subscribeFullTrajectory
description: Subscribe to full_trajectory channel of a given vehicle.

name: unsubscribeFullTrajectory
description: Unsubscribe from full_trajectory channel

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: getStopSequence
description: Get the list of stops for this vehicle.

name: getStopSequences
description: Get a list of stops for a list of vehicles.

return.description: Return an array of stop sequences.

name: subscribeStopSequence
description: Subscribe to stopsequence channel of a given vehicle.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Function called on each message of the channel.

name: unsubscribeStopSequence
description: Unsubscribe from stopsequence channel

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: subscribeHealthCheck
description: Subscribe to healthcheck channel.

params.name: onMessage
params.description: Callback when the subscribe to healthcheck channel succeeds.

name: unsubscribeHealthCheck
description: Unsubscribe to healthcheck channel.

name: src/api/index.js
src/api/typedefs.js
content:
/**
 * @typedef {Object} Departure
 * @property {number} time Timestamp in ms.
 * @property {boolean} no_stop_between
 * @property {number} train_number
 * @property {string[]} to
 * @property {number} ris_aimed_time Timestamp in ms.
 * @property {number} updated_at Timestamp in ms.
 * @property {boolean} new_to
 * @property {number} min_arrival_time Timestamp in ms.
 * @property {string[]} next_stoppoints List of next stops. Like value in at_station_ds100.
 * @property {number} ris_estimated_time Timestamp in ms.
 * @property {NetworkLine} line
 * @property {boolean} has_fzo if true this departure has realtime data.
 * @property {number} train_id
 * @property {string} platform
 * @property {?*} state
 * @property {number} fzo_estimated_time Timestamp in ms.
 * @property {?*} formation
 * @property {?*} no_stop_till
 * @property {number} train_type
 * @property {number} call_id
 * @property {string} created_at Timestamp in ms.
 * @property {string} at_station_ds100
 * @property {number} timediff Timestamp in ms.
 *
 */

/**
 * @typedef {GeoJSONFeature} Station
 * @property {StationProperties} properties Returns the station's properties.
 * @property {GeoJSONPoint} geometry Returns a point.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} StationProperties
 * @property {Transfer[]} transfers
 * @property {boolean} elevatorOutOfOrder
 * @property {number} uic
 * @property {string} name
 * @property {NetworkLine[]} networkLines
 * @property {boolean} hasElevator
 * @property {boolean} hasZOB
 * @property {boolean} hasAccessibility
 * @property {string} type
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} NetworkLine
 * @property {number} id Identifier of the line.
 * @property {string} color Color of the line (CSS color string).
 * @property {string} stroke Stroke color of the line (CSS color string).
 * @property {string} name Name of the line.
 * @property {string} text_color  Text color of the line  (CSS color string).
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} Transfer
 * @property {string} mot Mode of transportation (ex: U-Bahn).
 * @property {string[]} lines Array of lines name (ex: ["U4", "U5"]).
 */

/**
 * @typedef {GeoJSONFeature} StopSequence
 */

/**
 * @typedef {GeoJSONFeature} RealtimeTrajectory
 */

/**
 * @typedef {GeoJSONFeature} FullTrajectory
 */

/**
 * @typedef {GeoJSONFeature} Vehicle
 */

/**
 * @typedef {GeoJSONFeature} ExtraGeom
 */

properties.name: next_stoppoints
properties.description: List of next stops. Like value in at_station_ds100.

properties.name: has_fzo
properties.description: if true this departure has realtime data.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Color of the line (CSS color string).

properties.name: stroke
properties.description: Stroke color of the line (CSS color string).

properties.name: text_color
properties.description: Text color of the line  (CSS color string).

name: src/common/api/HttpAPI.ts
HttpAPI
description: Common class to access to a geOps api using http.

name: fetch
description: Append the apiKey before sending the request.

name: src/common/api/WebSocketAPI.js
WebSocketAPI
description:
Class used to facilitate connection to a WebSocket and
also to manage properly messages send to the WebSocket.
This class must not contain any specific implementation.

name: getRequestString
description: Get the websocket request string.

name: connect
description: (Re)connect the websocket.

params.name: onOpen
params.description: Callback called when the websocket connection is opened and before subscriptions of previous subscriptions.

name: close
description: Close the websocket definitively.

name: send
description: Sends a message to the websocket.

name: listen
description: Listen to websocket messages.

params.name: params
params.description: Parameters for the websocket get request

return.description: Object with onMessage and error callbacks

name: unlisten
description: Unlisten websocket messages.

params.name: params
params.description: Parameters for the websocket get request.

name: get
description:
Sends a get request to the websocket.
The callback is called only once, when the response is received or when the call returns an error.

params.name: params
params.description: Parameters for the websocket get request

params.name: onError
params.description: Callback on error and close event

name: subscribe
description: Subscribe to a given channel.

params.name: params
params.description: Parameters for the websocket get request

params.name: quiet
params.description: if false, no GET or SUB requests are send, only the callback is registered.

name: unsubscribe
description: Unsubscribe from a channel.

params.name: cb
params.description: Callback function to unsubscribe. If null all subscriptions for the channel will be unsubscribed.

name: subscribePreviousSubscriptions
description: After an auto reconnection we need to re-subscribe to the channels.

name: src/common/controls/Control.js
Control
description: A class representing a control to display on map.

unknown.tagValue: {ol/Map~Map|mapboxgl.Map} map - The map which the control refers to.
{boolean} active - Active the control.
{HTMLElement} element - The HTML element used to render the control.
{HTMLElement} target - The HTML element where to render the element property. Default is the map's element. Read only.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

params.name: options.active
params.description: Whether the control is active or not.

params.name: options.element
params.description: The HTML element used to render the control.

params.name: options.target
params.description: The HTML element where to render the element property. Default is the map's element.

params.name: options.render
params.description: Render function called whenever the control needs to be rerendered.

name: defineProperties
description: Define control's properties.

name: attachToMap
description: Attach the control to the map. Add events, html element ...

name: detachFromMap
description: Detach the control From the map. Remove events, html element ..

name: activate
description:
Add listeners then renders the control.
To be defined in inherited classes.

name: deactivate
description:
Remove listeners added by activate() function then renders the control.
To be defined in inherited classes.

name: render
description:
The default render function. It renders content in the HTML element.
To be defined in inherited classes.

name: createDefaultElement
description:
The default element to display if this.element is not defined.
To be defined in inherited classes.

content:
export * from './utils';
export * from './styles';

name: src/common/layers/Layer.js
Layer
description: A class representing a layer to display on map.

unknown.tagValue: {string} key - Identifier of the layer. Must be unique.
{string} name - Name of the layer
{string[]} copyrights - Array of copyrights.
{Layer[]} children - List of children layers.
{boolean} visible - Define if the layer is currently display on the map.
{boolean} disabled - Define if the layer is currently display on the map but can't be seen (extent, zoom ,data restrictions).
{number} hitTolerance - Hit-detection tolerance in css pixels. Pixels inside the radius around the given position will be checked for features.
{Object} properties - Custom properties.
{ol/Map~Map|mapboxgl.Map} map - The map where the layer is displayed.

name: constructor
description: Constructor

params.name: options.key
params.description: Identifier of the layer. Muste be unique. Default use a generated uuid.

params.name: options.children
params.description: Sublayers, all child layers will have a parent property associated to this layer.

params.name: options.visible
params.description: Define if the layer is currently display on the map.

params.name: options.disabled
params.description: Define if the layer is currently display on the map but can't be seen (extent, zoom ,data restrictions).

params.name: options.hitTolerance
params.description: Hit-detection tolerance in css pixels. Pixels inside the radius around the given position will be checked for features.

name: defineProperties
description: Define layer's properties that needs custom get and set.

name: attachToMap
description: Initialize the layer with the map passed in parameters.

name: detachFromMap
description: Terminate what was initialized in init function. Remove layer, events...

name: getFeatureInfoAtCoordinate
description:
Request feature information for a given coordinate.
This function must be implemented by inheriting layers.

params.name: options
params.description: Some options. See child classes to see which are supported.

name: flat
description: Return the an array containing all the descendants of the layer in a flat array. Including the current layer.

return.description: A list of copyrights to render.

name: CopyrightMixin

params.name: Base
params.description: A class to extend with {CopyrightInterface} functionnalities.

return.description: A class that implements <CopyrightInterface> class and extends Base;

name: src/common/mixins/RealtimeLayerMixin.js
RealtimeLayerInterface
description: RealtimeLayerInterface.

name: attachToMap
description: Initialize the layer subscribing to the Realtime api.

name: detachFromMap
description: Terminate the layer unsubscribing to the Realtime api.

name: start
description: Start the clock.

name: stop
description: Stop the clock.

name: setBbox
description: Set the Realtime api's bbox.

params.name: extent
params.description: Extent to request, [minX, minY, maxX, maxY, zoom].

params.name: zoom
params.description: Zoom level to request. Must be an integer.

name: setMode
description: Set the Realtime api's mode.

name: getTrajectoryInfos
description: Request the stopSequence and the fullTrajectory informations for a vehicle.

params.name: mode
params.description: The mode to request. If not defined, the layer´s mode propetrty will be used.

return.description: A promise that will be resolved with the trajectory informations.

name: RealtimeLayerMixin
description: Mixin for RealtimeLayerInterface.

params.name: Base
params.description: A class to extend with {RealtimeLayerInterface} functionnalities.

return.description: A class that implements {RealtimeLayerInterface} class and extends Base;

name: deactivateUserInteractions

name: onClick

name: onHover

return.description: A class that implements {UserInteractionsLayerInterface} class and extends Base;

content:
/**
 * @typedef {function} FilterFunction
 * @param {Object} vehicle Vehicle to filter.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} ViewState
 * @property {number} time A time in ms.
 * @property {number[2]} center A center in mercator coordinate.
 * @property {number[4]} extent An Extent in mercator coordinates.
 * @property {number[2]} size A size ([width, height]).
 * @property {number} rotation A rotation in radians.
 * @property {number} resolution A resolution.
 * @property {number} zoom A zoom level.
 * @property {number} pixelRatio A pixel ratio.
 */

/**
 * @typedef {Object} FeatureInfo
 * @property {Layer} layer A layer.
 * @property {ol/Feature~Feature[]} features  An array of features.
 * @property {number[2]} coordinate The coordinate where to find the featue.
 */

properties.name: coordinate
properties.description: The coordinate where to find the featue.

name: src/ol/controls/CopyrightControl.js
CopyrightControl
description: Display layer's copyrights.

name: src/ol/controls/RoutingControl.js
RoutingControl
description: Display a route of a specified mean of transport.

unknown.tagValue: {string} apiKey - Key used for RoutingApi requests.
{string} stopsApiKey - Key used for Stop lookup requests (defaults to apiKey).
{string} stopsApiUrl - Url used for Stop lookup requests (defaults to https://api.geops.io/stops/v1/lookup/).

{Array.<Array<graph="osm", minZoom=0, maxZoom=99>>} graphs - Array of routing graphs and min/max zoom levels. If you use the control in combination with the [geOps Maps API](https://developer.geops.io/apis/maps/), you may want to use the optimal level of generalizations: "[['gen4', 0, 8], ['gen3', 8, 9], ['gen2', 9, 11], ['gen1', 11, 13], ['osm', 13, 99]]"
{string} mot - Mean of transport to be used for routing.
{object} routingApiParams - object of additional parameters to pass to the routing api request.
{object} snapToClosestStation - If true, the routing will snap the coordinate to the closest station. Default to false.

{boolean} useRawViaPoints - Experimental property. Wen true, it allows the user to add via points using different kind of string. See "via" parameter defined by the [geOps Routing API](https://developer.geops.io/apis/routing/). Default to false, only array of coordinates and station's id are supported as via points.
{RoutingLayer|Layer} routingLayer - Layer for adding route features.
{function} onRouteError - Callback on error.
{boolean} loading - True if the control is requesting the backend.

name: loading
description: True if the control is requesting the backend.

name: getGraphsResolutions
description: Calculate at which resolutions corresponds each generalizations.

name: addViaPoint
description:
Adds/Replaces a viaPoint to the viaPoints array and redraws route:
  Adds a viaPoint at end of array by default.
  If an index is passed a viaPoint is added at the specified index.
  If an index is passed and overwrite x is > 0, x viaPoints at the specified
    index are replaced with a single new viaPoint.

params.name: index
params.description: Integer representing the index of the added viaPoint. If not specified, the viaPoint is added at the end of the array.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Marks the number of viaPoints that are removed at the specified index on add.

name: removeViaPoint
description:
Removes a viaPoint at the passed array index and redraws route
By default the last viaPoint is removed.

params.name: index
params.description: Integer representing the index of the viaPoint to delete.

name: setViaPoints
description: Replaces the current viaPoints with a new coordinate array.

name: reset
description: Removes all viaPoints, clears the source and triggers a change event

name: abortRequests
description: Aborts viapoint and route requests

name: drawRoute
description:
Draws route on map using an array of coordinates:
  If a single coordinate is passed a single point feature is added to map.
  If two or more coordinates are passed a request to the RoutingAPI fetches
      the route using the passed coordinates and the current mot.

name: drawViaPoint
description: Draw a via point. This function can parse all the possibilitiies

name: onMapClick
description:
Used on click on map while control is active:
  By default adds a viaPoint to the end of array.
  If an existing viaPoint is clicked removes the clicked viaPoint.

name: onModifyStart
description:
Used on start of the modify interaction. Stores relevant data
in this.initialRouteDrag object

name: onModifyEnd
description:
Used on end of the modify interaction. Resolves feature modification:
  Line drag creates new viaPoint at the final coordinate of drag.
  Point drag replaces old viaPoint.

name: createDefaultElement
description: Define a default element.

name: createModifyInteraction
description: Create the interaction used to modify vertexes of features.

name: addListeners
description: Add click listener to map.

name: removeListeners
description: Remove click listener from map.

src/ol/layers/Layer.js
Layer
description: A class representing a layer to display on an OpenLayers map.

unknown.tagValue: {ol/Map~Map} map - The map where the layer is displayed.

name: constructor
description: Constructor.

params.name: options.name
params.description: Layer name. Default use a generated uuid.

params.name: options.key
params.description: Layer key, will use options.name.toLowerCase() if not specified.

params.name: options.visible
params.description: If true this layer is the currently visible layer on the map.

name: defineProperties
description: Define layer's properties.

name: attachToMap
description: Initialize the layer and listen to feature clicks.

name: detachFromMap
description: Terminate what was initialized in init function. Remove layer, events...

name: toggleVisibleListeners
description: Toggle listeners needed when a layer is avisible or not.

content:
# mobility-toolbox-js

Toolbox for JavaScript applications in the domains of mobility and logistics.
The tools in this library have been inspired by many projects realized for public transport agencies, mobility providers and logistics companies.

[![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/mobility-toolbox-js.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mobility-toolbox-js)
[![Build](https://github.com/geops/mobility-toolbox-js/workflows/Build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/geops/mobility-toolbox-js/actions?query=workflow%3ABuild)
![Vercel](https://vercelbadge.vercel.app/api/geops/mobility-toolbox-js)

## Documentation and examples

Visit https://mobility-toolbox-js.vercel.app/

## Demos

* Display [real-time vehicle positions and prognosis data](http://tracker.geops.ch/) on a map.
* Search for [stops and stations](https://maps.trafimage.ch) all over the world.
* Get [precise geographic courses](https://routing-demo.geops.io/) for all modes of transport.
* Generate beautiful [schematic](https://mobility.portal.geops.io/world.geops.networkplans) or [topographic](https://mobility.portal.geops.io) maps for public transport, mobility and logistics.

## Version 1.x.x

The master branch is now open for the version 2 development. The version 1 is still available in [1.x.x](https://github.com/geops/mobility-toolbox-js/tree/1.x.x) branch.

## Deploy

This library website is deployed automatically using [Vercel](https://vercel.com/geops).
For Vercel we have to add the nextjs and raw-loader modules in the dev dependencies of the main package.json.
But those 2 librairies are not need to build the library.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "mobility-toolbox-js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "description": "Toolbox for JavaScript applications in the domains of mobility and logistics.",
  "version": "2.0.0-beta.37",
  "main": "index.js",
  "exports": {
    ".": "./index.js",
    "./api": "./api/index.js",
    "./mapbox": "./mapbox/index.js",
    "./ol": "./ol/index.js",
    "./types": "./types/index.d.ts"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@turf/helpers": "^6.5.0",
    "@turf/transform-rotate": "^6.5.0",
    "lodash.debounce": "4.0.8",
    "lodash.throttle": "4.1.1",
    "path": "^0.12.7",
    "turf": "^3.0.14",
    "uuid": "8.3.2"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "mapbox-gl": "^1",
    "maplibre-gl": "^1",
    "ol": "^6"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "7.16.12",
    "@babel/eslint-parser": "7.16.5",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "7.16.10",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.16.11",
    "@babel/preset-react": "7.16.7",
    "@commitlint/cli": "17.0.2",
    "@commitlint/config-conventional": "17.0.2",
    "@types/arcgis-js-api": "^4.24.0",
    "@types/arcgis-rest-api": "^10.4.5",
    "@types/geojson": "^7946.0.8",
    "@types/topojson": "^3.2.3",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^5.30.5",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^5.30.5",
    "autoprefixer": "9.7.6",
    "cypress": "9.4.1",
    "deepmerge": "4.2.2",
    "esbuild": "^0.14.47",
    "esbuild-jest": "^0.5.0",
    "esdoc": "1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "1.1.2",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-typescript-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "eslint": "8.8.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "19.0.4",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-typescript": "^17.0.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "8.3.0",
    "eslint-plugin-cypress": "2.12.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "2.25.4",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.6.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "4.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.30.1",
    "fixpack": "3.0.6",
    "husky": "8.0.1",
    "jest": "26.6.3",
    "jest-canvas-mock": "2.3.1",
    "jest-fetch-mock": "3.0.3",
    "jest-serializer-html": "7.1.0",
    "jest-transformer-svg": "^2.0.0",
    "jest-websocket-mock": "2.3.0",
    "lint-staged": "12.3.3",
    "mapbox-gl": "1.13.2",
    "maplibre-gl": "2.1.9",
    "mock-socket": "9.1.2",
    "next": "12.1.6",
    "next-transpile-modules": "9.0.0",
    "ol": "6.14.1",
    "openapi-typescript": "^5.4.0",
    "postcss": "8.3.3",
    "postcss-loader": "3.0.0",
    "prettier": "2.5.1",
    "raw-loader": "4.0.2",
    "sass": "1.52.2",
    "sass-loader": "8.0.2",
    "sort-json": "2.0.0",
    "standard-version": "9.5.0",
    "start-server-and-test": "1.14.0",
    "stylelint": "14.3.0",
    "stylelint-config-recommended-scss": "5.0.2",
    "stylelint-config-standard": "24.0.0",
    "stylelint-scss": "4.1.0",
    "typescript": "^4.7.4"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "apidoc": "esdoc && cp apidoc/index.json doc/src/components/Esdoc",
    "build": "rm -rf build && yarn tsc && yarn esbuild:iife && cp README.md build/ && cp package.json build/ && cp -R src/types build/",
    "coverage": "yarn test  --watchAll=false  --coverage --coverageDirectory=coverage",
    "cy:open": "cypress open",
    "cy:test": "start-server-and-test dev http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --browser chrome'",
    "cy:test:chrome": "yarn build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --browser chrome'",
    "cy:test:edge": "yarn build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --browser edge'",
    "cy:test:firefox": "yarn build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --browser firefox'",
    "dev": "yarn doc && yarn dev:examples",
    "dev:examples": "cd doc && yarn dev",
    "doc": "yarn build && yarn apidoc && cd doc && yarn install --frozen-lockfile && yarn build",
    "esbuild": "yarn esbuild:all && yarn esbuild:iife",
    "esbuild:all": "esbuild src/index.js src/**/*.js src/**/*.ts src/**/**/*.js src/**/**/*.ts --target=chrome100 --outdir=build/ --loader:.js=jsx",
    "esbuild:iife": "yarn esbuild:iife:unminify && yarn esbuild:iife:minify",
    "esbuild:iife:base": "esbuild src/iife.js --bundle --sourcemap --target=chrome100",
    "esbuild:iife:minify": "yarn esbuild:iife:base --minify --outfile=build/mbt.min.js",
    "esbuild:iife:unminify": "yarn esbuild:iife:base --outfile=build/mbt.js",
    "format": "prettier --write 'src/**/*.js' && eslint 'src/**/*.js' --fix && stylelint 'src/**/*.css' 'src/**/*.scss' --fix",
    "lib": "REACT_APP_LIB_MODE=1  webpack --mode production",
    "lib:dev": "REACT_APP_LIB_MODE=1  webpack --mode development",
    "link2": "cmdToAdd=$(node ./scripts/read-pkg-json.js add) && $cmdToAdd && yarn build && cmdToRemove=$(node ./scripts/read-pkg-json.js remove) && $cmdToRemove && cd build && yarn link",
    "lint": "eslint src/**/*.js src/**/*.ts && stylelint src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss --allow-empty-input",
    "publish:beta": "HUSKY=0 yarn release -- --prerelease beta --skip.changelog && git push origin HEAD && yarn run build && cd build && HUSKY=0 yarn publish --tag beta && git push --tags ",
    "publish:beta:dryrun": "yarn release -- --prerelease beta --dry-run --skip.changelog",
    "publish:public:dryrun": "yarn release --dry-run",
    "release": "standard-version",
    "start": "yarn doc && cd doc && yarn start",
    "start:examples": "cd doc && yarn build && yarn start",
    "test": "TZ='UTC' jest",
    "test:watch": "yarn test --watchAll",
    "tsc": "tsc",
    "types:backend": "openapi-typescript https://developer.geops.io/swagger/routing.json --output types/routing.d.ts && openapi-typescript  https://developer.geops.io/swagger/stops.json --output types/stops.d.ts"
  },
  "browserslist": {
    "production": [
      ">0.2%",
      "not dead",
      "not op_mini all"
    ],
    "development": [
      "last 1 chrome version",
      "last 1 firefox version",
      "last 1 safari version",
      "last 1 ie version"
    ]
  },
  "keywords": [
    "mobility",
    "toolbox"
  ],
  "lint-staged": {
    "(src|__mocks__)/**/*.js": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write",
      "git add",
      "yarn test --bail --findRelatedTests"
    ],
    "package.json": [
      "fixpack --sortToTop name --sortToTop license --sortToTop description --sortToTop version --sortToTop author --sortToTop main --sortToTop module --sortToTop files --sortToTop exports --sortToTop proxy --sortToTop dependencies --sortToTop peerDependencies --sortToTop devDependencies --sortToTop resolutions --sortToTop scripts"
    ],
    "src/**/*.{css,scss}": [
      "stylelint --fix --allow-empty-input"
    ]
  },
  "prettier": {
    "trailingComma": "all",
    "singleQuote": true
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/geops/mobility-toolbox-js"
  },
  "stylelint": {
    "plugins": [
      "stylelint-scss"
    ],
    "extends": [
      "stylelint-config-standard",
      "stylelint-config-recommended-scss"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
map
description: The map which the control refers to.

name: active
description: Active the control.

name: element
description: The HTML element used to render the control.

name: target
description: The HTML element where to render the element property. Default is the map's element. Read only.

name: key
description: Identifier of the layer. Must be unique.

name: name
description: Name of the layer

name: copyrights
description: Array of copyrights.

name: children
description: List of children layers.

name: visible
description: Define if the layer is currently display on the map.

name: disabled
description: Define if the layer is currently display on the map but can't be seen (extent, zoom ,data restrictions).

name: hitTolerance
description: Hit-detection tolerance in css pixels. Pixels inside the radius around the given position will be checked for features.

name: properties
description: Custom properties.

name: map
description: The map where the layer is displayed.

name: apiParams
description: Default request parameters used by the search method. See [Stops service documentation](https://developer.geops.io/apis/5dcbd702a256d90001cf1361/).

name: map
description: The map where the layer is displayed.

name: apiKey
description: Key used for RoutingApi requests.

name: stopsApiKey
description: Key used for Stop lookup requests (defaults to apiKey).

name: stopsApiUrl
description: Url used for Stop lookup requests (defaults to https://api.geops.io/stops/v1/lookup/).

name: graphs
description: Array of routing graphs and min/max zoom levels. If you use the control in combination with the [geOps Maps API](https://developer.geops.io/apis/maps/), you may want to use the optimal level of generalizations: "[['gen4', 0, 8], ['gen3', 8, 9], ['gen2', 9, 11], ['gen1', 11, 13], ['osm', 13, 99]]"

name: mot
description: Mean of transport to be used for routing.

name: routingApiParams
description: object of additional parameters to pass to the routing api request.

name: snapToClosestStation
description: If true, the routing will snap the coordinate to the closest station. Default to false.

name: useRawViaPoints
description: Experimental property. Wen true, it allows the user to add via points using different kind of string. See "via" parameter defined by the [geOps Routing API](https://developer.geops.io/apis/routing/). Default to false, only array of coordinates and station's id are supported as via points.

name: routingLayer
description: Layer for adding route features.

name: onRouteError
description: Callback on error.

name: loading
description: True if the control is requesting the backend.

name: map
description: The map where the layer is displayed.

name: map
description: The map where the layer is displayed.

description: The map where the layer is displayed.

description: The map where the layer is displayed.

description: The map where the layer is displayed.

description: The map where the layer is displayed.
